game.title: Rescue the Princess
game.objective: Rescue the princess from the evil dragon.
game.description: The evil dragon Smaug has kidnapped the princess. The king is offering a reward to anyone who can rescue her.

task.description: Make your way to the dragon's lair, following the path in the forest.
Fight the dragon and slay it, rescuing the princess.

task.objective: Return to the king with the princess.
task.description: Bring the princess back to the king to collect your reward.
